channel.title: JSON Web Token :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video JSON Web Tokens (JWT) Now that we have a working authentication system, the next step is to configure a method to request a valid JSON Web Token, or JWT, that contains information about the authenticated user. We’ve already learned a bit about JWTs in this course, so we won’t cover too many of the details here. To work with JWTs, we’ll need to install the jsonwebtoken package from NPM:
